channel.title: exercise on Kabads
channel.description: Recent content in exercise on Kabads

item.title: Gilbert White's Zig-Zag Walk
item.description: We went for a walk around Selborne, the home of Gilbert White, who some claim was the first English Naturalist.

item.title: TADS walk Swindon to Goring
item.description: TADS - Teresa, Adam, Dave and Shep walking. We have been walking for about 2 years now, all around the South East. This was our longest walk by far in two days. Swindon to Goring. The walk started out with us meeting at Swindon having lunch. There seemed to be quite a lot going on in the town with Canadian flags and guys at the train station with Ice Hockey sticks.

item.title: Ran over 600km
item.description: So, I’ve set myself a target of running 1000km this year. I realised a couple of months ago that I’ve run quite a lot this year. I got to June and had run more than any other year before. So, the idea is to keep running and get to 1000km (621 miles) by December.

item.title: TADS Walk around Bramley
item.description: Went for a walk with Teresa, Adam, Dave and Shep (TADS) around the village of Bramley, and Silchester. Saw some deer on the way.
